Articles.Content:
The first to go to Eve or the sun and make a space station

on evey planet/moon Stock Only ! show pictures

or go to duna and plot all cordnates for easter eggs and send in pic
You might want to edit punctuation (people like to read things that are easy to read) and add scoring. Also, this looks like two challenges at one. Which one do you want us to do?

make a low solar space station. Easy.

Get to eve orbit, make space station, easier.

Map duna anomalies, downloading mapsat now. Easy.

Using nothing but RCS?

Okay if you say so.

Reviving this was not necessary, especially since you have not posted any more information alpha tech. Please review the Challenge Submission Guidelines as has been recommended.

Thread closed.
